6. Project 
WebConfig, WebConfigVasCTV, Data3G,DataPlus,Italk 
Position (s) 
Java Developer 
Responsibility 
- Analyze information, build business process 
- Programming the assigned modules 
- System deployment 
- Post-deployment user support 
- Build solutions for testers and testers 
- Write CheckList and handover sourceCode to the focal point 
- Build up the table configuration: Confix, Syntax, Product ... to be able to 
configure process processing in process. 
- Revise the new requirements: Redo the new update with the sql 
statement, update each field, modify the fields on the form, update the field, 
optimization and performance will be faster. 
Repeat the new add command, delete also with the new command to 
optimize the system. 
- After updating, adding, deleting and importing files, ExportFile, then sql 
showlog on web form. 
Customer 
Viettel Telecom 
Duration  01/2016–06/2016
